dsOverview.title: NESS NOAA Vertical Temperature Profile Radiometer (VTPR) Observations, 1974Sep

summary.p: This dataset contains global vertical temperature data from the NOAA Vertical Temperature Profile Radiometer (VTPR) for September 1974.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCDC > National Climatic Data Center, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Temperature > Air Temperature

reference.authorList: McMillin, L.M., D.Q. Wark, et al.
reference.title: Satellite Infrared Soundings From NOAA Spacecraft
